overview: At an exclusive Hollywood party, Kirby David ends up sleeping with one of the industry's most out of control A-list celebrities, Allison Turner. Soon Kirby is the newest star in town and is the toast of the party.  When Allison Turner's celebrity friends become jealous of all of the attention she's getting, they decide to call Allison's boyfriend, and ex-professional wrestler, Axelrod. Kirby soon finds out that he's about to be murdered and learns that there is no escape from the FlashBash or his newfound celebrity status.
title: Charlie Cobb's Flash Bash
